subject: Re: Urgent help - Product page issue

full_threads.body:
Hi Samir,

Sure, the customized file was from previous developer and when the plugin is updated it overwrites the customized file.

Thanks Joel. I get that but how was that changed as we haven't done anything in terms of plugin updates or made changes to the codes?

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |
